languages.text: "Хейнрикс, дай уточню: я же не сош{mf|ел|ла} с ума, а твоя коллега несет лютую ересь?"
"Heinrix, make sense of this for me: am I going mad, or is your colleague engaging in flagrant heresy here?"
languages.original_text: "Хейнрикс, дай уточню: я же не сош{mf|ел|ла} с ума, а твоя коллега несет лютую ересь?"

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, make sense of this for me: am I going mad, or is your colleague engaging in flagrant heresy here?"
"Heinrix, make sense of this for me: am I going mad, or is your colleague engaging in flagrant heresy here?"
"Heinrix, make sense of this for me: am I going mad, or is your colleague engaging in flagrant heresy here?"
"Heinrix, make sense of this for me: am I going mad, or is your colleague engaging in flagrant heresy here?"

languages.text: “帮我解释一下吧，海因里希。究竟是我发了疯，还是你的同事在肆无忌惮地宣扬异端邪说？”
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, make sense of this for me: am I going mad, or is your colleague engaging in flagrant heresy here?"

traits.locale_text: “帮我解释一下吧，海因里希。究竟是我发了疯，还是你的同事在肆无忌惮地宣扬异端邪说？”

languages.text: «Heinrix, acláreme una duda: ¿he oído mal o su compañera acaba de admitir que está hasta el cuello de herejía?».
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, make sense of this for me: am I going mad, or is your colleague engaging in flagrant heresy here?"

traits.locale_text: «Heinrix, acláreme una duda: ¿he oído mal o su compañera acaba de admitir que está hasta el cuello de herejía?».

languages.text: 「ハインリックス、教えてくれ。{mf|俺|私}は気が狂っているのか？それともお前の仲間はここで明らかな異端の行為を行っているのか？」
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, make sense of this for me: am I going mad, or is your colleague engaging in flagrant heresy here?"

traits.locale_text: 「ハインリックス、教えてくれ。{mf|俺|私}は気が狂っているのか？それともお前の仲間はここで明らかな異端の行為を行っているのか？」

languages.text: « Heinrix, éclairez ma lanterne : est-ce moi qui sombre dans la folie, ou votre collègue s'adonne-t-elle à l'hérésie la plus totale ? »
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, make sense of this for me: am I going mad, or is your colleague engaging in flagrant heresy here?"

traits.locale_text: « Heinrix, éclairez ma lanterne : est-ce moi qui sombre dans la folie, ou votre collègue s'adonne-t-elle à l'hérésie la plus totale ? »

languages.text: "Heinrix, erklärt mir das: Werde ich wahnsinnig, oder betreibt Eure Kollegin hier schamlos Ketzerei?"
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, make sense of this for me: am I going mad, or is your colleague engaging in flagrant heresy here?"

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, erklärt mir das: Werde ich wahnsinnig, oder betreibt Eure Kollegin hier schamlos Ketzerei?"

languages.text: "Heinrix, bana mantıklı bir şekilde açıklayabilir misin: Deliriyor muyum yoksa meslektaşın, aşikâr bir kâfirlik içinde mi?"
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, make sense of this for me: am I going mad, or is your colleague engaging in flagrant heresy here?"

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, bana mantıklı bir şekilde açıklayabilir misin: Ben mi deliriyorum yoksa çalışma arkadaşın aşikâr bir kâfirlik içinde mi?"
